pr_title: Furnace based machines could no longer be used as vanilla furnace with the hoppers.

timeline.bodyText:
not sure if this adds all furnace type machines but for slimefun it self you forgot Electric furnace and Electric Smeltery
it would be nice if this blocks it for all Furnace type machines even for addons.

replies.bodyText: Yes, I will be adding the rest and excluding the Enchanced Furnaces. I don't know how to though without making it messy. Will look through the codebase to get an idea.

timeline.bodyText: Yes thjs would work but wouldn't it be really tedious to keep adding machines to this that are also furnaces i think the best way to do this is to check if its a furnace and it has an id then cancel the event

How about an abstract class SlimefunContainer extending AContainer and then extending the SlimefunContainer in all those furnace based machines which extends AContainer and the listener cancels the InventoryMoveItemEvent from hopper if the destination block is an instance of SlimefunContainer?
TL;DR: Like Fluffy did in commit NCBPFluffyBear/FluffyMachines@52b6fec
